patthana15.80:1.1: Araṇaṃ sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.80:2.1: Araṇaṃ asekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.80:3.1: Araṇaṃ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasaraṇo nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
